Subjects discontinue study drug treatment Lead-in Period randomize participate double-blind Treatment Period Follow-up Period ; 3 ) double-blind Treatment Period subject randomize 1 2 treatment group follow study end ; 4 ) double-blind Follow-up Period , randomized subject discontinue study drug follow study end . The Randomization Phase consist double-blind Treatment Period double-blind Follow-up Period . Subjects receive country-specific standard care weight management Randomization Phase . An independent event adjudication committee evaluate potential cardiovascular outcome event confirm outcome event time onset include statistical analysis .

Medical history positive : Preexisting cardiovascular disease ( i.e. , coronary artery disease , cerebrovascular disease , peripheral arterial occlusive disease ) and/or Type 2 diabetes mellitus least 1 risk factor ( i.e. , dyslipidemia , control hypertension , current smoker , diabetic nephropathy evidence microalbuminuria ) History recent myocardial infarction . Heart failure symptom great New York Heart Association Functional Class II . Hemodynamically significant valvular leave ventricular ( LV ) tract obstruction . Subjects without pacemaker following : Sinus bradycardia ( < 50 bpm ) Sick sinus syndrome Atrioventricular block 1st degree Mean sit systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) > 160 mmHg . Mean sit diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > 100 mmHg . Mean sit heart rate ( HR ) > 100 bpm . Syncopal episodes presume due uncontrolled lifethreatening arrhythmia . Planned cardiac surgery coronary angioplasty within 6 month screen . History recent nonhemorrhagic stroke transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) , history hemorrhagic stroke . Hyperthyroidism . Known chronic liver disease endstage renal disease . Severe , symptomatic benign prostatic hyperplasia may require surgery . Known pheochromocytoma , history narrow angle glaucoma , Gilles de la Tourette syndrome , history seizure , history bariatric abdominal obesity surgery ( exclude liposuction ) .
